QuestData.Title: Stopping the Grand Rite
QuestData.Description:
The witches of the Crimsonwood are planning a Grand Rite, a powerful ritual. They intend to rip open reality and bring their dark master through!
I suspect they may be in communion with Gorak Tul. We cannot allow their ritual to succeed.
I need you to be the tip of the spear while I protect Master Ashton and Marten. Cause havoc and disrupt their rituals!
QuestData.RewardText: Damn!. We've slowed them down, but they are still working. To fully stop them we'll need to do more.
